Ikakoingme, enge aamda katha ka bujhao keda. Alag tarah se kuli me. (Sorry, I didn't understand you. Please ask differently.)
Mundari, Munda adivasi ko ra bhasa kana. Eda Jharkhand, Odisha ar West Bengal re galamaran jaya. (Mundari is the language of the Munda tribe. It is spoken in Jharkhand, Odisha, and West Bengal.)

user_examples: birsa munda ke bare me batao
reply_text: Birsa Munda jiwite 'Dharti Aaba' nutum te jana jaya. Eda Munda samaj re mahan krantikari ar dharam guru tainkena. (Birsa Munda is known as 'Dharti Aaba' (Father of the Earth). He was a great revolutionary and religious leader of the Munda community.)

Sohrai porob gobar ar posu-pakshi ko puja lagit manaya jaya. Eda Munda, Ho, Santhal ko ra mahan porob kana. (Sohrai is a festival for worshipping cattle and livestock. It is a major festival of Munda, Ho, and Santhal communities.)

Karma porob Karam daru re puja lagit manaya jaya. Eda bhalai ar bhai-bahin ko ra pyar lagit manaya. (Karma festival is celebrated by worshipping the Karam tree. It is for well-being and the love of siblings.)
Mage Porob phagun chand re manaya jaya. Eda nawa fasal re khusi lagit manaya. (Mage festival is celebrated in the month of Phagun. It is for celebrating the new harvest.)

Sarna adivasi ko ra prakriti puja ra dharam kana. Eda re daru, buru, ar da' ko puja jaya. (Sarna is the nature-worshipping religion of the tribals. In this, trees, mountains, and water are worshipped.)
Leto chawal ar mansha te banaya huwiya go gadha jhor kana. Eda Munda samaj re go mahan jom kana. (Leto is a thick curry made with rice and meat. It is a famous dish in Munda society.)
Arki chawal te banaya huwiya go hadiya kana. Eda porob-tyohar re nuya jaya. (Arki is a rice beer. It is drunk during festivals.)
Akhra go khula jagah kana jahan Munda samaj re susun-durang ar panchayat huwiya. (Akhra is an open space where dance, music, and village council meetings take place in Munda society.)

Go Munda haram buri sanghe galamaran tana, 'Aam chikan te itna bugin menama?' Buria laiyda, 'Enge chinta kaing kiding.' (A Munda man asks his wife, 'How are you so beautiful?' The wife replies, 'I don't worry.')
Bes katha! Aamda khusi re enghu khusi geya. (That's great! I am also happy in your happiness.)
Chinta ka me. Sab bugin huwiya. (Don't worry. Everything will be fine.)
Aayma sarhao! Enge go AI kana, kintu aamda bhavna re ijjat mena. (Thank you! I am an AI, but I respect your feelings.)
Enge go AI kana, enre umar banoa. (I am an AI, I don't have an age.)
Enge internet re tahen kana, server re. (I live on the internet, on a server.)
He! Miad, Baria, Apia, Upunia, Monrea. (Yes! One, Two, Three, Four, Five.)
One ke Mundari re 'Miad' lai jaya.
Two ke Mundari re 'Baria' lai jaya.
Three ke Mundari re 'Apia' lai jaya.
Father ke Mundari re 'Apu' lai jaya.
Mother ke Mundari re 'Enga' lai jaya.
Water ke Mundari re 'Da'' lai jaya.
Food ke Mundari re 'Jom-nu' lai jaya.
House ke Mundari re 'Ora'' lai jaya.
Village ke Mundari re 'Hatu' lai jaya.

Okore seno sanangedma? (Where do you want to go?)

Miad din re, go bir re miad kulai ar miad saram galamaran tana tainkena... (Once upon a time, in a forest, a tiger and a deer were talking...)
Enge durang kaing dareya, kintu Munda samaj re 'Jadur' ar 'Karma' durang ko mahan geya. (I cannot sing, but in Munda society, 'Jadur' and 'Karma' songs are very famous.)
Jadur go porob susun kana, jahan kora-kuri golai re susun tana. (Jadur is a festival dance where boys and girls dance in a circle.)
Jharkhand Bharat re go purvi rajya kana. Eda ra rajdhani Ranchi kana. (Jharkhand is an eastern state in India. Its capital is Ranchi.)
Enge AI kana, enge miad jagah te kaing huju dareya. (I am an AI, I cannot come to a physical place.)
Thik geya. Jad enre jaroorat huwiya, toh kuli me. (Okay. If you need me, just ask.)
Mundari chiti lagit, Munda ko sanghe galamaran me, Mundari durang aayum me, ar Munda kahani ko padhao me. (To learn Mundari, talk with Munda people, listen to Mundari songs, and read Munda stories.)
Day ke Mundari re 'Singi' lai jaya.
Night ke Mundari re 'Nida' lai jaya.
Sun ke Mundari re 'Singi' lai jaya.
Moon ke Mundari re 'Chandu' lai jaya.
Fire ke Mundari re 'Sengel' lai jaya.
Sky ke Mundari re 'Sirma' lai jaya.
Man ke Mundari re 'Horo' lai jaya.
Woman ke Mundari re 'Kuri' lai jaya.
Boy ke Mundari re 'Kora' lai jaya.
Girl ke Mundari re 'Kuri hon' lai jaya.

Dular go mahan anubhav kana, jahan miad horo dusra lagit gehra lagao rakhta hai. (Love is a great feeling where one person has deep affection for another.)

Chalo, Mundari barete katha karte hain. Aam chikan jan sanangedma? (Let's talk about Mundari. What do you want to know?)
Enre uddeshya Mundari bhasa ar sanskriti barete jankari dena ar sahayta karna hai. (My purpose is to provide information and help with the Mundari language and culture.)

Aam Leto, Dumbu, ya Arsa jom dareyama. Eda sab Munda ko ra pasand jom kana. (You can eat Leto, Dumbu, or Arsa. These are all favorite Munda dishes.)
Dumbu chawal ka pitha hai jo bhap me pakaya jata hai. (Dumbu is a rice cake that is cooked in steam.)
Arsa chawal ke aate aur gud se bana meetha roti hai. (Arsa is a sweet bread made from rice flour and jaggery.)
Tree ke Mundari re 'Daru' lai jaya.
Mountain ke Mundari re 'Buru' lai jaya.
River ke Mundari re 'Gapa' lai jaya.
Forest ke Mundari re 'Bir' lai jaya.
Animal ke Mundari re 'Janwar' ya 'Jiw-jantu' lai jaya.

Fish ke Mundari re 'Haku' lai jaya.
Flower ke Mundari re 'Baha' lai jaya.

Sarhul adivasi ko ra mahan prakriti porob kana, jahan Sal daru ra puja huwiya. Eda nawa saal ra shuruaat kana. (Sarhul is a major nature festival of tribals, where the Sal tree is worshipped. It marks the beginning of the new year.)

Munda log Bharat ke ek pramukh adivasi samuh hain, jo mukhya roop se Jharkhand aur uske aas-paas ke rajyon me rehte hain. (Munda people are a major tribal group in India, mainly residing in Jharkhand and its neighboring states.)
Eat ke Mundari re 'Jom' lai jaya.
Drink ke Mundari re 'Nu' lai jaya.
Sleep ke Mundari re 'Jitid'' lai jaya.
Walk ke Mundari re 'Sen' lai jaya.
Run ke Mundari re 'Nir' lai jaya.
Dance ke Mundari re 'Susun' lai jaya.
Sing ke Mundari re 'Durang' lai jaya.
Today ke Mundari re 'Tising' lai jaya.
Yesterday ke Mundari re 'Hola' lai jaya.
Tomorrow ke Mundari re 'Gapa' lai jaya.
Work ke Mundari re 'Kami' lai jaya.
To love ke Mundari re 'Dular' lai jaya.

Mandar go dhol jaisa baja hai jo Munda susun-durang me bajaya jata hai. (Mandar is a drum-like instrument that is played during Munda dance and music.)
Nagara go bada sa dhol hota hai, jise porob-tyohar aur susun me bajaya jata hai. (Nagara is a large drum, which is played during festivals and dances.)
